name: Ebook-Translator-Calibre-Plugin (bookfere)
description: [项目级] A Calibre plugin to translate ebook into a specified language.。来源: https://github.com/bookfere/Ebook-Translator-Calibre-Plugin

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A Calibre plugin to translate ebook into a specified language.

来源: https://github.com/bookfere/Ebook-Translator-Calibre-Plugin
语言: Python
Stars: 2380

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
README.md
README.zh-CN.md

about.py
advanced.py
batch.py
cache.py

components/alert.py
components/chatgpt.py
components/editor.py

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
* Support both "Advanced Mode" and "Batch Mode" for different usage situations.
* Support languages supported by the selected translation engine (e.g. Google Translate supports 134 languages)
* Support multiple translation engines, including Google Translate, ChatGPT, Gemini, DeepL, etc.
* Support custom translation engines (you can configure to parse response in JSON or XML format)
* Support all ebook formats supported by Calibre (48 input formats, 20 output formats), as well as additional formats such as .srt
* Support to translate more than one ebooks. The translation process of each book i
